last_episode_to_air.name: Everybody Still Hates Career Tests
last_episode_to_air.overview: Chris and Greg tape over a porno rented from Caruso and need to replace it. Rochelle leads a strike at work. Julius debates placing a bet using inside info from Louis's new job with the New York Giants.

name: Everybody Still Hates Chris
overview: A re-imagined animated version of Chris Rock's beloved autobiographical family comedy Everybody Hates Chris.
tagline: New stories. New look. Same Chris.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates the GED
episodes.overview: Chris Rock fails his GED and has to return to his all-white school, where he tries to improve his social standing by impersonating a gang member. Chris' mom gets a job at a mattress store, only to discover her husband Julius is her new supervisor.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates Block Parties
episodes.overview: Chris' neighborhood hosts its annual block party, where Chris tries to spend time with girl-next-door Tasha, and Rochelle gets embroiled in a nasty mac n cheese competition with her arch nemesis Peaches.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates Drew's Brother
episodes.overview: Chris feels overshadowed by Drew at school and leans into his identity as "Drew's Brother." Tonya gets a house key but loses it and has to break in. Rochelle forces Julius to make a work friend.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates the KKK
episodes.overview: When Chris has a run-in with a member of the KKK, Rochelle puts him through a personalized class at her "You Ain't White Academy." Julius, Drew, and Tonya battle a gang of a capella singers.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates Cheat Codes
episodes.overview: Chris debates using a cheat code in Mike Tyson's Punch-Out to win a free Nintendo, while Rochelle debates kicking her brother out of the house.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates Halloween
episodes.overview: Chris spends Halloween at a church "Hallow-clean" event in hopes of hooking up with Tasha, while Rochelle and Julius spend the night at a work party, trying to annoy Rochelle's boss into laying her off for severance pay.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates Breakdancing
episodes.overview: When Chris, Drew, and Greg start a breakdancing club to get out of gym class, Greg tests the limits of Chris' friendship. Tonya wants to wear grown up clothes, and the guys at the barbershop try to cure Julius' "butt blindness."

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates Jackie Robinson
episodes.overview: Chris enlists Tonya to help him break up with a girl, Drew prepares to give a speech about the time Jackie Robinson held him as a baby, and Julius tries to one-up his "fake-doctor" chiropractor brother Louis.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates Bullies
episodes.overview: Chris gets a gig DJing at a drag ball, while Julius tries to handle Tonya's sore throat on his own without calling Rochelle back from her business trip.

episodes.name: Everybody Still Hates Career Tests
episodes.overview: Chris and Greg tape over a porno rented from Caruso and need to replace it. Rochelle leads a strike at work. Julius debates placing a bet using inside info from Louis's new job with the New York Giants.
